message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,500. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I believe it's a bit high at $11,500, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. While I believe $11,500 is a fair reflection of the value this product brings, I'm open to finding a solution that works for both of us. How about we meet in the middle at $10,600?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. I'd be willing to go up to $10,200, but that's my limit. Can we meet at that price?
